sentences.en: "But, why?" he asked in make-believe astonishment.
sentences.cn: “可是为什么呢？”他故作惊讶地问。

sentences.en: Both astonishment and joy, she could hardly say a word.
sentences.cn: 她惊喜交集,一句话也说不出来.

sentences.en: Drouet listened to her in astonishment. This was something new.
sentences.cn: 杜洛埃吃惊地听她说话, 感到她的话里有点新东西.

sentences.en: He gasped in astonishment and I escaped a scolding.
sentences.cn: 他张着嘴一句话也说不出来.我就此顺利地逃脱了一次“声讨”.

sentences.en: He gave a start of surprise and astonishment.
He looked at me in astonishment.
He was filled with astonishment at seeing the dead body.
sentences.cn: 他看见尸体时惊恐万状.

sentences.en: I spotted a shooting star which, to my astonishment, was bright green in colour.
sentences.cn: 我看见一颗流星，使我大为惊奇的是，它居然是鲜亮的绿色。

sentences.en: I was filled with astonishment at her strange action.
sentences.cn: 我对她的奇怪举动不胜惊异.

sentences.en: She stared at him in astonishment.
She stood up quickly, giving a little cry of astonishment.
sentences.cn: 她迅速站了起来，惊叫了一声。

sentences.en: Sitting pole-axed on the sofa, Mahoney stared in astonishment at the spectacle before him.
sentences.cn: 马奥尼不知所措地坐在沙发上，吃惊地盯着眼前的景象。

sentences.en: They heard him give a loud shout of astonishment.
sentences.cn: 他们听见他惊奇地大叫一声.

sentences.en: To our astonishment, they arrived on time.
sentences.cn: 使我们惊奇的是, 他们准时来到了.
